directions: Combine 2 cups distilled white vinegar, 2 dried chiles de árbol, and 2 Scotch bonnet chiles (or any of your favorite dried or fresh chiles), quartered lengthwise, in a 1-pint jar. Seal and shake. Let sit at room temperature for 1 week before using.
ingredients: Ingredient info: You can find chiles de árbol and Scotch bonnet chiles at some supermarkets and at Latin markets.
title: Pepper Vinegar
